report.title: Occurrences by Survey
report.description: Lists individual surveys registered on the core module and the total number of occurrences associated with each.
report.query: SELECT su.title as survey, w.title as website, w.id as website_id, COUNT(o.id) as count FROM report_websites w JOIN surveys su on su.website_id=w.id LEFT JOIN (samples s JOIN occurrences o on o.sample_id=s.id AND o.deleted='f' )on s.survey_id=su.id WHERE #website_filter# GROUP BY survey, website, w.id
